verses.english: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
verses.hausa: Ka ce "ina neman tsari ga Ubangijin safiya"

verses.english: From the evil of that which He created
And from the evil of darkness when it settles
verses.hausa: "Da sharrin dare, idan ya yi duhu."

verses.english: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
verses.hausa: "Da sharrin mãtã mãsu tõfi a cikin ƙulle-ƙulle."

verses.english: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
verses.hausa: "Da sharrin mai hãsada idan ya yi hasada."
